attributes.action: Reduce minimum wage temperorily to fight inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public policy has generally been to increase minimum wages in accordance with inflation, which itself increases inflation. It is requested to allow businesses to temporarily (Max three months) REDUCE Min wages by max. 25% and pass the benefits accordingly to consumers. Employees may complain to appropriate authority if wages have been reduced and the benefit has not been passed to consumers.
